title.en: Kirby of the Stars! Raging Pupupu Hour!

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoshi no Kirby! Mouretsu Pupupu Hour!

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ！ もーれつプププアワー！

description.en: The popular Kirby has been adapted into a new manga to commemorate the completion of the DS game *Kirby: Squeak Squad*! The Squeak Squad, the great bandits, have appeared in the peaceful land of Pupupu Land! However, they are constantly pushed around by Kirby's appetite and copying ability...

altTitles.ja: デッドデッドデーモンズデデデデデストラクション

description.en:
A series about the lives of two high school girls living in Tokyo after aliens have invaded. Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction is a self-styled dystopian slice-of-life that reflects on modern societal and political issues in Japan while still maintaining a sense of humor and frivolity.

Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed.

No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**

description.de:
Obet Alphons hat sich mit dem Sohn des Großherzogs angelegt und wird in ein Katz- und Mausspiel verwickelt!

„Meine eigene Zukunft liegt in Trümmern, du Trottel!“

Obet nimmt als Junge verkleidet an einer kaiserlichen Veranstaltung teil, um ein Teleskop zu erhalten. Sie versucht, ihr Essen zu genießen, als sie einen unhöflichen Jungen trifft, der sie für einen Bettler hält. Obet hält sich nicht zurück und erteilt ihm eine Lektion, in dem Glauben, dass sie ihn nie wieder sehen wird. Wie es das Schicksal so will, trifft sie am nächsten Tag „den Trottel von gestern“ in ihrem Gesellschaftszimmer an! Der Junge findet heraus, dass Obet ein Mädchen ist. Sie versucht, um jeden Preis wegzulaufen. Doch der unnachgiebige Junge ist ihr dicht auf den Fersen und bedroht die Zukunft der Alphons. Was will er eigentlich? Wird Obet es schaffen, sich von diesem hartnäckigen und mächtigen Kerl zu distanzieren?

---

description.en:
Obet Alphons gets on the wrong side of the Grand Duke's son and gets tangled up in a game of cat and mouse!

"My own future is in ruins, you jerk!"

Obet attends an imperial event dressed as a boy for a telescope. She tries to enjoy her meal when she meets a rude boy who mistakes her for a beggar. Obet doesn't hold it in and teaches him a lesson, thinking she'll never see him again. As fate would have it, the next day, she finds "that jerk from yesterday" in her drawing room! The boy figures out that Obet is a girl. She wants to run away, whatever it takes. But the relentless boy is hot on her tail, threatening the future of the Alphons. Just what does he want? Will Obet be able to separate herself from this persistent and powerful punk?

---
Obet gets on the bad side of the Grand Duke's son and falls into a chaotic, youthful romance!

"My future is in ruins, you jerk…!"

Obet attends an imperial family event dressed as a boy, for a telescope. She tries to enjoy her meal when she meets a rude jerk who asks if she’s a beggar. Obet doesn’t hold it in and teaches him a lesson, thinking she’ll never see him again…

"But why is that boy sitting in our living room?!"

The boy finds out that Obet is a girl. She wants to run away. But he keeps chasing after her. What does he want? Will Obet be able to separate herself from this persistent leech?

---
Obet has no idea what she signed up for when she attends the prince's oath ceremony disguised as her sick twin brother. Before she can make a good impression on the prince, a snooty young lord pokes fun at her, and the two of them spend the day bickering with each other. As it turns out, the lord is none other than Hinn, the son of the grand duke. To make matters worse, he instantly recognizes Obet when he visits her estate! Once he threatens to reveal what she did and bring shame to her family, she has no choice but to be nice to him. It's easy enough to avoid him at first, but this becomes harder when they start attending the same academy. Will Obet be able to keep Hinn from exposing her secret, despite the fact that he seems to be on a mission to annoy her 24/7?

---

description.fr:
Obet Alphons se met un jour à dos le fils du Grand-Duc et se retrouve embarquée dans un jeu du chat et de la souris!

«C’est mon avenir qui est ruiné, imbécile!»

La famille d’Obet la pousse à assister à un événement impérial déguisée en garçon en échange d’un télescope. Alors qu’elle tente de profiter de son repas, elle rencontre un garçon impoli qui la prend pour une mendiante. Obet ne se retient pas de lui donner une bonne leçon, pensant qu'elle ne le reverra jamais. Mais le lendemain, le destin fait qu'elle retrouve «le crétin d'hier» dans son salon! Le garçon comprend qu'Obet est une fille, et elle cherche à s’enfuir à tout prix. Mais l’impitoyable garçon est à ses trousses et menace l'avenir de la famille Alphons. Que veut-il au juste? Obet parviendra-t-elle à se défaire de cet imbécile qui est aussi tenace que puissant?

---

description.id:
Obet Alphons terpaksa menggantikan kembarannya—Ordo Alphons yang sedang sakit—untuk menghadiri upacara sumpah kesetiaan. Berkat penampilan mereka yang identik, segalanya berjalan lancar sampai Obet bertemu dengan Hinn Rehoboam, putra tunggal Duke Agung Rehoboam yang mengancam akan membongkar rahasianya. Meski Obet sudah berusaha menghindari Hinn, tapi takdir malah mempertemukan keduanya di sekolah yang sama! Apakah rahasia Obet akan tetap aman dengan kemunculan Hinn?

---

description.ja:
大公家の子息ヒンとオベット嬢のドタバタ青春ロマンス
“あんたさえいなけりゃ未来は明るいっての！“
高熱を出した双子兄、オルドーの代わりに皇室の儀式に男装して参加することになったオベット嬢 
それもこれも欲しかった望遠鏡を買ってくれるという母の甘い誘惑に釣られて… 
おいしいものを思う存分食べようと思っていたら隣には「お前みたいな乞食が来る場所じゃない」と 
何かとつっかかってくる嫌な奴。 
今後こんな奴とは仲良くする必要ないしと得意のサッカーゲームでギャフンと言わせてスッキリ爽快！ 
そんな翌日… 
“どうしてあいつが私の家にいるの?!”　 
あの嫌な奴が大公家の息子だっていうの？それに女ということもご法度の代理参加もバレてしまっていたなんて… 
逃げても逃げてもハイエナのようにしつこく付きまとう彼を、果たして追い払う事が出来るのだろうか！？

---

description.ko:
대공가의 아들에게 찍혀버린 오벳의 좌충우돌 청춘 로맨스! 
‘당장 내 미래가 깜깜하다, 이 자식아…!’ 

망원경에 넘어가 남장을 하고 황실 행사에 참석하게 된 오벳. 
맛있는 거나 실컷 먹으려는데 거지가 굴러 들어 왔냐며 시비를 거는 재수없는 놈을 만난다. 
어차피 한번 보고 말 사이, 오벳은 시원하게 한 방 먹이는데… 
그런데 왜 그 놈이 우리 집 응접실에 앉아 있지?! 
자신이 여자인 것을 들킨 오벳, 어떻게든 도망치고 싶다. 
그러나 거머리처럼 계속 쫓아오는 재수없는 그 놈. 도대체 목적이 뭐야? 
오벳은 과연 이 거머리처럼 끈질긴 놈을 떼어 놓는데 성공 할 수 있을까?

---

被大公家儿子盯上的奥贝横冲直撞的青春罗曼史! “臭小子,现在我的未来才是一片黯淡啊…!” 被望远镜收买女扮男装去参加皇室活动的奥贝。 本想尽情享受美食,却遇到了一个说她是乞丐各种找茬挑事的家伙。

description.es-la:
Un apacible día, se le presenta su primera prueba. En lugar del otro gemelo Ordo, que estaba enfermo, debe asistir a la reunión con el un príncipe de su edad. "¡No quiero ir! ¿Por qué tengo que fingir que soy Ordo?" "Oye, Ovette. Te compraré el telescopio que dijiste que querías tener la última vez". "Mamá, me convertiré en Ordo más perfectamente que nadie". Ovette entró en el palacio imperial con todo preparado. Y allí, se involucra con una persona extraña que ni siquiera es el príncipe. De todos modos, no voy a volver a verle, así que le apliqué la medicina correctamente... "Eres el único hijo del Archiduque Rehovem, ¿cómo te has hecho amigo de alguien así?" ¿Perdón... ...? Por alguna razón, tengo la sensación de que voy a estar terriblemente enredado con Rehovem. "Te deseo lo mejor en el futuro, el futuro de Alphonse". No, ¡espera! ¿Dónde está la amistad entre el Archiduque y el Marqués?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54162322), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8555785), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1629003272)

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: An ordinary 30-year-old salaryman named Yang Dong gets transported into the role of the female protagonist in a Mary Sue harem novel. Although in his own eyes he still looks like a middle-aged man, others see him as a lovely high school girl. Now he’s falling into classic shoujo tropes and getting tangled up with the four male protagonists! How will he survive with his dignity?

title.en: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.ja: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！

altTitles.zh: 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Mengambil Segalanya Dariku, Jadi Aku Menikahi Ibunya!

altTitles.tr: Kahraman Her Şeyimi Elimden Çaldı, Ben de Annesiyle Parti Yaptım!

altTitles.en: The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero’s Mother!

description.en:
A young man wants to marry the mothers of the hero's party—

As a member of the hero's party Ceres, the main character, set out to defeat the demon king.
But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party.
All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Ms Shizuko, the mother of the hero, sold as a slave—??

The unreasonably expelled young man's Isekai mama harem is born!!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja:
少年が結婚したいのは、
勇者パーティのお母さんたちでした――

勇者パーティの一員として
魔王の倒す旅に出ている主人公・セレス。

だがある日突然、勇者ゼクトからクビ宣告を受け、
パーティを抜けることに。

一人になったセレスは、
身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。

その奴隷市場で見かけたのは
奴隷として売られた、勇者の母親である静子さんの姿が――？？

理不尽に追放された少年の
異世界ママハーレムが産声を上げる！！
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!

description.en: Marcus has a crush, and Cog is completely unprepared for the hijinks that follow. Hopefully in their efforts to grow closer, they can brighten each other's day.
description.pt-br: Marcus tem uma queda por Cog e Cog está completamente despreparado para as travessuras que se seguem. Esperançosamente, em seus esforços para se aproximarem, eles podem iluminar o dia um do outro.

altTitles.ja: エロティック×アナボリック

description.en:
Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class.   
He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit!  
Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!  
  
[ So in short THICCNESS is great on this one ;) ]

Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

description.en:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

title.en: S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

description.en:
**I'm done with romance, so send me home!**

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.
Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home!
Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?!?!

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

Can I go home......?
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

description.en: Shingo Chiryuu isn't much different than any other guy except for one thing… He's afraid of girls. He was attacked by an overweight girl because she was turn down from confessing to him, which caused him to develop a fear of women, seeing them all as "dinosaurs". Even despite all his efforts to get away from the girls, they seem to always found their way to him, making trouble along the way. Now he finds himself surrounded by girls, including the one whose attack instilled fear in him, as he attempts to cure himself of his gynophobia.
description.pt-br: A história gira em torno de Shingo Chiryu, um garoto comum, exceto por um detalhe. Ele foi espancado e hospitalizado por um mês por uma garota nua cuja confissão ele rejeitara. Como resultado, Shingo desenvolveu ginecofobia (medo perante todas as mulheres). Enquanto tenta esconder o seu temor, a enfermeira lhe aconselha a se juntar ao clube de boxe. Visto que todas as estudantes são garotas, agora, ele encontra-se rodeado por meninas, inclusive a que lhe atacou.

description.en: A man who was reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
description.ko:
요리사를 꿈꾸던 내가 사고로 이세계에 떨어졌다.

몬스터와 마법이 넘쳐나는 판타지 세계이지만 여기라고 식당을 못할 건 없잖아?

그러나 전쟁으로 인해 이세계에 들어오자마자 군대에 끌려가게 되고,
...

description.en: Sakuma, a teacher at an all-girls school, sees his wife in the red-light district cheating on him one day. In response, he runs away and decides to tour Japan, going wherever his heart may lead him. He finally reaches Odawara and meets a young girl, that looks like the one he always sees in his dreams. He barely manages to stop himself from crossing the line with the girl, and he eventually returns to his normal life, having discovered that his wife's alleged cheating was all a misunderstanding. But then...
description.pt-br: Sakuma, um professor em uma escola só para meninas, vê sua esposa no distrito de prostituição o traindo. Em resposta, ele foge e decide fazer uma turnê pelo Japão, indo aonde seu coração o levar. Ele finalmente chega a Odawara e conhece uma jovem, que se parece com a que ele sempre vê em seus sonhos. Ele mal consegue se impedir de cruzar a linha com a garota e, eventualmente, retorna à sua vida normal, ao descobrir que a suposta traição de sua esposa foi um mal-entendido. Mas então...

title.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

altTitles.ja: コローリ コローレ クレアーレ

description.en: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!

title.en: I'm the Queen in This Life

altTitles.en: Sister, In This Life, I’ve Become The Queen

description.en: Her fiance, her sister, and her parents. Ariadne returns 14 years from the past, the day she was cast aside by everyone. "Shit! I am trying to court you right now!" From her fiance, who acted much different than he did in the past, "Don't cry, Ariadne. Don't you know how pretty you are to me?" to the kind Prince, who fell for her at first sight. This time, she will get revenge on everyone and become Queen.

Senya is just an ordinary boy, who wanted to become an astronaut as a kid. One day and suddenly, he's transported into another world after seeing on the rooftop of his school something like a "tower" going across the sky. There, he witnesses a ruined world, where skyscrapers are connected by suspension bridges. Senya, perplexed, manages to see a girl standing on the roof of another building, as well as a masked man holding a bloody weapon in his hands…

An accident forced two handsome schoolboys who originally disliked each other to bind together in a love game. Chi Che became a game player, while Cen Huang’s soul left his body to become a game system. In order to return back to normal, both player and system can only brace themselves and complete the rest of the game’s strategy missions. What’s outrageous is that the attack target is unexpectedly Cen Huang’s soulless body?! Thus, a straight guy helping another straight guy pursue his own dramatic love game has now begun…

A dangerous control freak senior who refuses to socialize x an optimistic talkative junior who lacks love.

altTitles.th: จอมโจรอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Teenage magician Kaito Kuroba has a secret identity: that of Kaitou Kid, a famous internationally-known and wanted "phantom thief". Kaito took the identity after one day discovering that his late father was the original Kaitou Kid. Later on, he discovers his father, who died from an 'accident' during a magic trick, was really murdered because he would not steal the jewel Pandora for an evil organization. As Kaitou Kid, Kaito tries to find Pandora before that organization that killed his father do, and destroy it, leading Inspector Nakamori and his taskforce on the wildest jewel heists imaginable!
description.ja: 世紀の宝物を予告通りに手中し、闇から闇へと消え去る紳士・怪盗キッド！！見事なマジックで名刑事らの裏をかき、目指すは「正義」の完全犯罪！！今宵、神出鬼没の彼が狙う宝石は、時価4億円の「月の瞳」だ！！

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα τους διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

Satoko Tawada is an office worker. She's almost 30 years old, but she still hasn't been able to find happiness in her life. Fate brings her with Mashu Hayami, a beautiful 12-year-old boy whom she finds practicing soccer all by himself in the park. Out of a whim, she decides to help Mashu with his practice, with her knowledge of soccer at her disposal. As they practice together on an everyday routine, the two eventually develop an emotional bond. When Satoko's ex-boyfriend deceives her, Mashu gladly comforts her. And when Satoko learns of Mashu's mostly absent parents, she starts to concern herself with his personal life. The two lonely souls find common ground and develop an emotional bond that transcends their age difference and circumstances. With this newfound bond, new feelings start to sprout within Satoko. Are these feelings that of maternity? Or is it something else?  
  
Awards:  
- Ranked #11 in the 2017 Manga Taisho Awards  
- Won 3rd place in the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Awards, Category Print Manga (2017)  
- Won 2nd Place in the 2017 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! Awards for male readers  
- Won 1st Place in the 2016 Oreman (俺マン) My Best Manga Gran Prix manga rankings.
description.pt-br: Satoko Tawada é uma mulher de 30 anos que trabalha em uma companhia, mas ainda não conseguiu achar a felicidade em sua vida. O destino faz com que ela cruze caminhos com Mashuu Hayami, um belo garoto de 12 anos de idade que ela encontra treinando futebol. Em um impulso, ela decide o ajudar com seu treino. Enquanto praticam e criam uma rotina juntos, os dois criam laços emocionais um pelo outro, confortando e apoiando quando o outro precisa. Duas almas solitárias criam um vinculo que transcende a diferença de idades entre eles.

altTitles.ja: 愛重くんは病んでいる。

description.en: One day, Ichigotani Nanako receives a sudden confession from Agasa Yuki, the genius prince at school who's also her junior in her club. Surprised by this, the natural airhead Nanako blurts out, "I''ll be in trouble if you die though!" and ends up dating Agasa-kun. Anyway, Agasa-kun has an extraordinary obsession and possessiveness, and he has no mercy for any bugs that come near Nanako!
description.ja: ある日突然、部活の後輩で学校一の秀才プリンスである愛重由希に告白された苺谷奈々子。いきなりの告白に驚きながらも、天然な奈々子は「死なれたら困る！」と愛重くんと付き合うことに。とにかく愛が重い愛重くんは、執着の仕方も独占欲も異常で、奈々子に近づく悪い虫には容赦なし!!

altTitles.th: บุปผาราชินี

description.en:
Long ago, there existed a land divided into four countries: Sou, Kou, Do, and Ah. The King of Ah took on a wife from Kou and soon thereafter one from Do, creating a shaky alliance between the three nations. When the Second Queen gave birth to a son, the King cast aside the sickly First Queen and her daughter Aki into the depths of the Palace. But as Fate would have it, Princess Aki encounters a slave named Hakusei, who has peculiar golden hair and sky blue eyes. He promises his life to her and helps her train in the Six Arts under the guidance of the enigmatic merchant Seitetsu. However, when Aki outshines the Prince during a hunt in an attempt to gain her father's acknowledgement, she inadvertently sparks a war by besmirching Do's honor and drives the Second Queen to poison her mother. With nothing left but her faithful Hakusei, Aki is banished to the small country of Kou with a vow to return to Ah one day for revenge. But in the face of the mighty allied nations of Do and Ah, will the two survive long enough to carry out Aki’s vow?  
  
*Winner of the 60th Shogakukan Manga Awards for Best Shoujo.*

description.en: When Kanade was very young, she went to a ballet performance of her neighbour, Risa, and was overwhelmed by her amazing dancing. She decided then and there that she wanted to dance like Risa, and her parents agreed to let her take ballet lessons. Ballet is much harder than Risa's beautiful dancing may have led her to believe, but Kanade is determined to endure and become a wonderful ballerina!
description.pt-br: Kanade é uma garota com uma incrível habilidade de observar e executar as coisas. Essa é uma história sobre sua jornada descobrindo as belezas do balé clássico e a alegria em dançá-lo. A popular autora de mangás para maiores de dezoito anos, Cuvie, nos trás um mangás que faz a paixão do balé clássico ganhar vida.

description.en:
An only slightly particular ability hidden from others, a power of no benefit to anyone, yet recently because of it I can't help but be interested in you.  
  
Highlighting the secrets of 5 people and their slow-going feelings towards another…   
  
A series by the author of I Want To Eat Your Pancreas, Sumino Yoru, and the artist of Kanojo wa Rokurokubi, Nieki Zui. Sumino has previously released a Novel with the same name which this series is based on. The artist is working on this series, published in Gekkan Komikku @ Banchi, as well as Jun and Kaoru, published in Bessatsu Shounen Magazine, simultaneously.
description.es:
Una habilidad poco particular escondida a los demás, un poder que no beneficia a nadie, pero recientemente como consecuencia de ello no puedo evitar interesarme por ti.  
Destacando los secretos de 5 personas y sus sentimientos paulatinamente hacia otro…  
  
Una serie del autor de "Quiero comerme tu páncreas", Sumino Yoru, y el artista de Kanojo wa Rokurokubi, Nieki Zui. Sumino ha lanzado previamente una novela con el mismo nombre en la que se basa esta serie. El artista está trabajando en esta serie, publicada en Gekkan Komikku @ Banchi, así como en Jun y Kaoru, publicada en la revista Bessatsu Shounen, simultáneamente.
description.pt-br: Uma sutil habilidade particular escondida dos outros, um poder sem benefício para qualquer um, e mesmo assim, eu não consigo evitar de estar interessado em você. Contando os segredos de 5 pessoas e seus lentos sentimentos um pelo outro...

description.en: Me, a writer specializing in the occult, received a floor plan of a certain house. At first glance, it appeared to be an ordinary single-family home, but when I asked an acquaintance, architect Kurihara, for his opinion, he told me, *"There is something strange about this house."* He began there is something hidden in this floor plan the much-talked-about real estate mystery.
description.ja: オカルト専門ライターの「私」は知人から、とある家の間取り図を見せられた。そこには正体不明の「謎の空間」が存在するという。建築設計士・栗原に意見を求めると、彼はこの家のおかしなところを次々に指摘し始めた……！

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill “Porter,” which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party “Black Lion of Foresight.” One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk’s skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?

Great Mazinger starts after the defeat of Mazinger Z. Tetsuya Tsurugi is the new protagonist, piloting the powerful Great Mazinger, a creation of the once thought dead Kenzo Kabuto, the father of Koji Kabuto. This time the enemy is the Mycene Empire and its powerful robots.

A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

description.en: Manga about a girl who was looking for a job and ended up in a corporation of magical girls fighting monsters.
description.ru: Манга про девочку, которая искала работу и попала в корпорацию девочек-волшебниц, борющихся с монстрами.

title.en: Touhou - Until the Water Became Wholly Red (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: いけみずこくごとくあか

description.en:
Youkai Mountain, Gensokyo. Even within this closed-off world, the tengu have their own closed-off, multilayered society. All Shameimaru Aya wants is to work on the scoop of a lifetime, but all around her, much more complicated schemes are afoot, and it seems they can't help but get in her way.

Long-running doujin series by Ashiyama, author of "The Gensokyo of Humans" and "The Magician Who Loved a Fake". Published in book form and for free on Pixiv.

title.en: Hysteric na Kurokami Megane-kun wa Igai to Kawaii

altTitles.en: The Hysteric Black-Haired Glasses Guy is Unexpectedly Cute

altTitles.ja: ヒステリックな黒髪メガネくんは意外とかわいい

description.en:
The recent concerns of our straight-laced university student Fujie lies with the man who is too buddy-buddy with his best friend Yoshida.

On top of appearing flashy and frivolous, said man, Ooshima Haruki, has rumors floating about him that he's gay. And coupled with the fact that he's so close with Yoshida, now there's even rumors that they're dating...

Even though that guy is not worthy of Yoshida!!

He informs the two of the rumors about them, and receives a hearty laugh as a response. The two deny the rumors, and Fujie learns that Yoshida had received love advice from Ooshima in the past. He's shocked by the fact that Yoshida asked someone else, and not him. When he expresses his distaste for Ooshima and treats him coldly, for some reason Ooshima interacts with him more than necessary. What's more, when Fujie is feeling low, he steals his first kiss...!!

A flirtatious guy who's keen on physical intimacy x A straight-laced, serious bespectacled guy
The two from extreme opposites inch closer together: a dawdling, gradual love ★
A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

description.en:
The daily life of Lee Jae, a hot-blooded police officer in a quiet rural village, is turned upside down by the reunion with his first love.

Who would have thought that his first love, who had suddenly disappeared without a word one day, would reappear before him as a gangster?

"Just bear with it a little longer. I'm going to do everything that I've been putting off today."

Can he resist that dirty handsome face that he never wanted to see again?

On that day, humanity was turned into “prey”―Gen is a high school student living on the island of Tsushima, a door to mainland Japan.

Along with his sickly sister, Misaki, and his heartwarming mother, Gen was living a peaceful life, all until an “asymmetrical monster” appears on the island. All hell breaks loose on the island of Tsushima.

These monsters devour everything from plants to animals, to humans, and mutate together. Will humanity stand a chance against these mutant creatures? Is there any hope?
description.uk:
Того дня людство було перетворено на «здобич».
Ґен — старшокласник, який живе на острові Цушіма, що є дверима до материкової Японії.
Разом зі своєю хворобливою сестрою Місакі та чарівною матір'ю Ґен жив мирним життям, поки на острові не з'явився «асиметричний монстр».

Після цього на острові Цушіма починається пекло.

Ці монстри пожирають все, від рослин до тварин і людей. Після цього мутують.
Чи матиме людство шанс протистояти цим істотам-мутантам?
Є якась надія?

description.en: Being an Elite Nanny is simple: protect the charge, obey the principle, and don’t get emotionally attached. Easier said than done when Davina’s first client is a dangerously compelling Venetian underboss who’s determined to get under her skin. What he wants from her, she can’t imagine, but Gabriel Angelini drags her back into the glittering world of organized crime she thought she’d left behind forever. She might get answers about her past if she digs deep enough, but can she protect Mikey from his father’s ambitions and keep her heart from getting tangled up in their treacherous web?

In order to stop the invasion of the demons and seal the evil god which has been resurrected after a thousand years, Grey embarks on a journey together with his sister, Fiona, and his comrades. 

At the end of their journey, they were facing the evil god, and all of his comrades including his little sister were killed because of the evil god.

 

Being the only survivor of the journey, Grey was hailed as a hero and was granted the throne as the emperor of the holy empire, gaining glory and authority. 

 

Unfortunately, Grey couldn’t recover from the grief of losing his one and only sister, and decided to use any means necessary to revive her. After countless attempts to try and revive his sister, Grey became hopeless, until he heard a mysterious voice saying,

 

 [Do you want to save the most precious person in your life?]

 

[If you’re willing to sacrifice everything, I will show you the way.]

 

After making a deal with the mysterious voice,

Grey found himself standing in his hometown that was supposed to be destroyed by the invasion of the demons…

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: I'm a Villain, but I Saved the Female Lead

altTitles.ja: 悪女なのにヒロインを救ってしまった

altTitles.en: I'm a Villainess, but I Saved the Heroine
I'm a Villainess, but I Saved the Female Lead
I'm a Villain, but I Saved the Heroine

description.en:
I transmigrated into a novel as the villainess Rubelina, whose hopes of marrying the Crown Prince were dashed by the heroine Yvonne. I believed I could live happily as long as I stayed out of the love story between the heroine and the hero, Zilart. I lived my life without caring about them at all and as a result, the heroine and the hero became engaged without any trouble.

Thinking that my role was over, I was living peacefully when suddenly Yvonne came to visit me and blurted out:

"I want to break off my engagement with Prince Zilart!"

Um... in the novel, Rubelina is supposed to be the villainess, and Yvonne is supposed to be the heroine who lives happily ever after, isn't she...?

title.en: Story of a Small Senpai in My Company

altTitles.ja: うちの会社の小さい先輩の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Uchi no Kaisha no Chiisai Senpai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: Story of a Small Senior in My Company

description.en:
**-*"My senpai from work… is tiny and cute."***  
Shinozaki is an office worker who is taken care of and coddled by his senior team member Shiori Katase: a gorgeous, profoundly kind, loving, and diminutive woman. Shinozaki certainly hopes that she's not doing it out of duty… but her joy of doing so increasingly exposes her feelings!  
  
*This page refers to the popular webcomic's official serialization, which began on the Storia DASH website on April 3, 2020.*
description.pt-br:
-"Minha Senpai do trabalho... é pequena e fofa."

Shinozaki é um funcionário de escritório que é orientado e mimado pela sua Senpai Shiori Katase, que é linda, gentil, amável e pequena.

Shinozaki certamente espera que ela não esteja fazendo isso por obrigação... mas a sua alegria em fazê-lo cada vez mais expõe os sentimentos dela!

Esta página refere-se à serialização oficial da popular webcomic, que começou no site Storia DASH em 3 de abril de 2020.

altTitles.en: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included.

altTitles.ja: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。

altTitles.zh: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??

altTitles.en: They Say I'm the Villainous Young Miss

altTitles.vi: Họ Đồn Tôi Là Đại Tiểu Thư Xấu Xa

description.en: I worked as a manhua artist, then died from pulling an all-nighter. I woke up as the villainess "Emi Morwen" from my webcomic! Emi was an alluring yet cruel character who departed from the story by ending her own life. However, I’m not the real Emi!
description.vi: 《Sau khi thức quá khuya, chạy deadline để rồi kết thúc sinh mệnh, tôi đã tái sinh thành nhân vật phản diện trong truyện tranh của mình》

altTitles.ja: リバーシブルフレンド

description.en: After a night out partying, Mitsuhashi takes Yuki, his drunk best friend (with benefits), home. But, the night isn't over for Yuki when he decides to top the night off...by topping Mitsuhashi. Sleepy and satisfied, Yuki thinks he can drift off after finishing.
description.pt-br: Depois de uma noite de festa, Mitsuhashi leva Yuki, o seu melhor amigo bêbado (com benefícios), para casa. Mas a noite ainda não acabou para Yuki quando ele decide terminar a noite... dando uma queca a Mitsuhashi. Sonolento e satisfeito, Yuki pensa que pode adormecer depois de terminar.

altTitles.ja: あつまれ！ふしぎ研究部

description.en: Goryo Daisuke is still unsure about which club to join. When he meets the three girl members of Mysterious Research Club while looking for the school's warehouse, he gets hypnotized to sign the registration form. Suzu who is obsessed with scary curses, Chiaki who only relies on her monstrous strength to perform dangerous magic tricks, and Kotone who can control people by hypnosis.
description.pt-br: Goryo Daisuke ainda não sabe ao certo a qual clube ingressar. Quando ele conhece as três garotas do Clube de Pesquisa Misteriosa enquanto procura o depósito da escola, ele fica hipnotizado para assinar o formulário de inscrição. Suzu, que é obcecada por maldições assustadoras, Chiaki, que só conta com sua força monstruosa para realizar truques de mágica perigosos, e Kotone, que pode controlar as pessoas por meio da hipnose.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.
